mapper.select: select bb.* from ( select aa.*, rownum rnum, nvl((select count(*) from purchasefilm pf where pf.branchnum=1 and pf.filmnum=aa.filmnum) ,0) buy from ( select f.filmNum, f.filmName, f.filmStory, f.filmStart, f.filmEnd, f.filmHead, f.filmStatus, g.genreNum, g.genreName, m.filmNum mfilenum, m.movieImgUrl from film f left join genre g on f.genreNum=g.genreNum left join movieimg m on f.filmNum=m.filmNum order by f.filmNum asc )aa )bb where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select t.totalPeople,t.totalPrice,to_char(t.totalDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') totalDate,f.filmPrice from total t,film f where f.filmName=#{filmName} and t.filmNum = f.filmNum order by t.totalDate

select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select f.filmName,f.filmStory,mi.movieImgUrl,SUM(m.mScore) vg from mReview m,film f,movieImg mi where f.filmNum=m.filmNum and f.filmNum=mi.filmNum group by f.filmName,f.filmStory,mi.movieImgUrl order by vg desc ) aa ) where rnum<=4

select * from film
where filmstart<=sysdate and filmstatus='상영중'
